articles.author: Jenna Portnoy
articles.title: On four year anniversary of covid, families remember flags on Mall - The Washington Post
articles.description: Covid memorial flags are being archived as America moves further from the World Health Organization’s pandemic declaration, four years ago this month.
articles.content: Return to menuEd Koenig searched up one row and down the next, up and down, for hours. But on that warm, breezy day in September2021, he couldnt find the flag he had dedicated online to Jody Settle, … [+2043 chars]

articles.author: Li Zhou
articles.title: US maternal deaths could be lower than we thought — but there are still far too many - Vox.com
articles.description: A new study published in the American Journal of Obstetrics and Gynecology found that maternal mortality rates in the US may be lower than we previously thought, though still higher than multiple other developed countries.
articles.content: An apparent spike in maternal mortality rates in the US has been raising alarm in the last few years. According to data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the countrys materna… [+8592 chars]
